summary: Build a website for PMK TOWING SERVICE, a car towing/recovery service in Nellore, including contact phone +917842969695.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for “PMK TOWING SERVICE”, describing a car towing and recovery service in Nellore, using English for all user-facing text.
Add prominent contact actions using the provided phone number +917842969695, including a click-to-call link (tel:) and at least one persistent call-to-action button visible on mobile.
Include clearly labeled sections appropriate for a towing/recovery service website: Hero, Services, Service Area (Nellore), and Contact.

Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for an emergency roadside/towing business (distinct color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across all sections (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
Add generated static image assets to support the website (logo and hero visual), store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in the UI.

Add the two user-uploaded images (Photo_1770974079038.png and IMG_20260204_215933_110.jpg) to the frontend as static assets and render them on the Draft Version 2 homepage in a new, clearly labeled section.
Add navigation access to the new photos section from the header navigation using the existing smooth-scroll behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for PMK TOWING SERVICE (car towing/recovery in Nellore) including contact phone +917842969695.
Add photos to Draft Version 2 of the PMK TOWING SERVICE website (additional imagery beyond existing logo/hero).
